sourcesContent: import Link from 'next/link'; import { ListGroup } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux'; import { authLogout } from '../../store/actions/auth'; function LayoutCustomer(props) { const dispatch = useDispatch(); return ( Minha Conta Minhas Compras Meus Endere√ßos Alterar Senha { dispatch(authLogout()); }}> Sair ); } export default LayoutCustomer;
